title: Four Fish - style and content of first paragraph

content.prompt: Which statement best describes the style and content of the first paragraph?

choices.label: The author moves from the general to the specific as he considers the nutritional value of fish.
The author speaks in poetic fragments as he ponders the qualities and characteristics of fish.
The author employs technical terms as he critiques the primary types of fish.
The author's voice changes from conversational to academic as he clarifies his thoughts about fish.

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
